statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 2 \\ 3 \\ 2 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -1 \\ -3 \\ -4 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 7 \\ -4 \\ -3 \\ 2 \\ -11 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -21 \\ 7 \\ 0 \\ -14 \\ 28 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -1 \\ 0 \\ -4 \\ 3 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
